text: Canteleux is a former commune. It is in the region of Hauts-de-France in the Pas-de-Calais department. This is in the north of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into Bonnières.Arrêté préfectoral 25 September 2018, modified 26 October 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Pas-de-Calais
title: Canteleux
